author: RTÉ News
title: China and US must 'unite to fight virus' - Xi
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping in a call with his US counterpart Donald Trump said their countries should "unite to fight" the deadly coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Chinese President Xi Jinping in a call with his US counterpart Donald Trump said their countries should "unite to fight" the deadly coronavirus pandemic. 
The two countries have clashed in recent weeks over the virus and Chinese state media said Mr Xi told M… [+3142 chars]
